title: Conferences/Workshops
body:
Conferences/Workshops List of conferences/workshops which are relevant and useful for Tech enthusiasts and practitioners.
Table of Contents  July 2021 September 2021 October 2021 November 2021 December 2021 Missing any conference?  July 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     RedisConf 2021: on the Road 6, July 2021 Register Virtual (Free) IST    Sodacon 2021 13, 14 July 2021 Register Virtual (Free till June 15) PST    MongoDB.Live 13, 14 July 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    B Word 21 July 2021.
